mchorse.mappet.api.scripts.user.entities

Interface IScriptEntityItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IScriptEntity

    public interface IScriptEntityItem
extends IScriptEntity
    EntityItem interface.

    This interface represents an item entity.

    • Method Detail

      • getAge

        int getAge()
        Get entity's age. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     c.getSubject().send("Item's age: " + entityItem.getAge());
 }
        Returns:
        how many ticks entity exists

      • setAge

        void setAge(int age)
        Set entity's age. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     entityItem.setAge(5000);
     c.getSubject().send("Item's age: " + entityItem.getAge());
 }
        Parameters:
        age - ticks

      • getPickupDelay

        int getPickupDelay()
        Get entity's pickup delay. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     c.getSubject().send("You can pick up this item in " + entityItem.getPickupDelay() + " ticks.");
 }
        Returns:
        How many ticks remains until someone can pick up this item

      • setPickupDelay

        void setPickupDelay(int delay)
        Set entity's pickup delay. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     entityItem.setPickupDelay(100); // 5 seconds
     c.getSubject().send("You can pick up this item in " + entityItem.getPickupDelay() + " ticks.");
 }
        Parameters:
        delay - In ticks

      • getLifespan

        int getLifespan()
        Get entity's lifespan (max age). 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     c.getSubject().send("Item disappear in " + (entityItem.getLifespan() - entityItem.getAge()) + " ticks.");
 }
        Returns:
        How many ticks remains until someone can pick up this item

      • setLifespan

        void setLifespan(int lifespan)
        Set entity's lifespan (max age). 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     entityItem.setLifespan(1200); // 60 seconds
     c.getSubject().send("Item disappear in " + (entityItem.getLifespan() - entityItem.getAge()) + " ticks.");
 }
        Parameters:
        lifespan - In ticks

      • getOwner

        java.lang.String getOwner()
        Get entity's owner nickname (Who can pick up this item). Returns empty string if anyone able to pick it up. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     c.getSubject().send(entityItem.getOwner());
 }
        Returns:
        Nickname of player who can pick up this item.

      • setOwner

        void setOwner(java.lang.String owner)
        Set entity's owner nickname (Who can pick up this item). use with empty string, if you want anyone to be able to pick it up. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     entityItem.setOwner(c.getSubject().getName());
 }

      • getThrower

        java.lang.String getThrower()
        Get entity's thrower nickname (Who throw this item). Returns empty string if it spawns through code. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     c.getSubject().send(entityItem.getThrower());
 }
        Returns:
        Nickname of player who throw this item.

      • setThrower

 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond_hoe");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);
     entityItem.setThrower(c.getSubject().getName());
 }

      • getItem

        IScriptItemStack getItem()
        Get itemStack from this entity. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();
     var entities = c.getWorld().getEntities(pos.x, pos.y + 1, pos.z, 3);

     for (var i in entities)
     {
         var entity = entities[i];

         if (entity.isItem())
         {
             c.player.send(entity.getItem().getItem().getId());
         }
     }
 }

      • setItem

        void setItem(IScriptItemStack itemStack)
        Get itemStack from this entity. 
        
 // Midas :D
 // Turns any item in radius of 3 blocks into golden nuggets.
 function main(c)
 {
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();
     var entities = c.getWorld().getEntities(pos.x, pos.y + 1, pos.z, 3);

     for (var i in entities)
     {
         var entity = entities[i];

         if (entity.isItem())
         {
             entity.setItem(mappet.createItem("minecraft:golden_nugget"))
         }
     }
 }

      • setInfinitePickupDelay

        void setInfinitePickupDelay()
        Makes item unaffordable. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);

     entityItem.setNoDespawn();
     entityItem.setInfinitePickupDelay();
 }

      • setDefaultPickupDelay

        void setDefaultPickupDelay()
        Set's default pick up delay (10, actually).

      • setNoDespawn

        void setNoDespawn()
        Entity will not despawn. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var item = mappet.createItem("minecraft:diamond");
     var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();

     var entityItem = c.getWorld().dropItemStack(item, pos.x, pos.y + 3, pos.z);

     entityItem.setNoDespawn();
     entityItem.setInfinitePickupDelay();
 }

      • canPickup

        boolean canPickup()
        Returns whether it's possible to pick up this item, or not. 
        
 // Item magnet :D
 function main(c)
 {
     var player = c.getSubject();
     var pos = player.getPosition();
     var entities = c.getWorld().getEntities(pos.x, pos.y + 1, pos.z, 10);

     for (var i in entities)
     {
         var entity = entities[i];

         if (entity.isItem() && entity.canPickup())
         {
             player.giveItem(entity.getItem());
             entity.remove(); // despawn
         }
     }
 }
